widget.name: Todo List Widget
widget.description: A todo list widget that displays and manages todo items

property.caption: Todo Items
property.description: Data source containing the todo items

property.caption: Title Attribute
property.description: Attribute containing the todo item title

property.caption: Completed Attribute
property.description: Boolean attribute indicating if the todo item is completed

property.caption: Changed Date Attribute
property.description: DateTime attribute showing when the todo item was last modified

property.caption: Created Date Attribute
property.description: DateTime attribute showing when the todo item was created (displayed in hover tooltip)

property.caption: Owner Attribute
property.description: String attribute showing who created the todo item (displayed in hover tooltip)

property.caption: Changed By Attribute
property.description: String attribute showing who last modified the todo item (displayed in hover tooltip)

property.caption: Item Text Attribute
property.description: Attribute to store the item text for add and edit operations

property.caption: On Add Action
property.description: Action to execute when adding a new todo item

property.caption: On Toggle Action
property.description: Action to execute when toggling a todo item's completion status

property.caption: On Edit Action
property.description: Action to execute when editing a todo item

property.caption: On Delete Action
property.description: Action to execute when deleting a todo item

property.caption: Show Add Button
property.description: Show button to add new todo items

property.caption: New Item Placeholder
property.description: Placeholder text for the new todo item input
